text: Hi everyone! I'm Sean from Pepperland (an agency in CT). I'm not a developer, but I do dabble in code, and am hoping to familiarize myself more with HubSpot's CMS and a learn a bit from this group. Happy to be here!
Hi Everyone! I'm Aeroll from StraightArrow - HubSpot Agency partner in the 'Philippines. I'm a project manager and managing mostly website projects which include HubSpot.
Morning (if you are West Coast or West) I've been working in HubSpot marketing for years. We have built websites mostly in WordPress but are expanding into the HubSpot CMS

Hey All!! Hayley here :slightly_smiling_face: I am not new to HubSpot CRM or Marketing - but I am to the CMS platform.  Developer and Designer primarily in Wordpress and good ol' code. Looking forward to getting a strong handle on this!
Welcome Sean! We're super excited to have you a part of this community.

Hiiiii <@UDK6G43C7> - Welcome!! We're super excited to have you a part of this community. :slightly_smiling_face:

How has your HubSpot CMS experience been so far?

Hiiiii <@UDHTMSVDH> - Welcome to the party. :tada: We're excited to have you a part of the HubSpot CMS community.

How has your HubSpot CMS experience been so far? - Any specific questions?
Just getting started really, so nothing to report
